Package serverSide.sharedRegions

Class RefereeSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverSide.sharedRegions.RefereeSite
  • public class RefereeSite
extends java.lang.Object
    Referee Site. It is responsible for handling refereeSite-related actions during the rope game. It is implemented as an implicit monitor. All public methods are executed in mutual exclusion. There are no internal synchronization points.

    • Constructor Summary

      Instantiation of the referee site

      • RefereeSite

    • Method Detail

      • announceNewGame

        public void announceNewGame()
        Operation announce new game. Transition start operations in the life cycle of the Referee. (START_OF_THE_MATCH -> START_OF_A_GAME) OR (END_OF_THE_GAME -> START OF A GAME) It is called by the referee when he wants to announce a new game.

      • callTrial

        public void callTrial()
        Operation call for a new trial. Transition to teams ready in the life cycle of the Referee. (START_OF_A_GAME -> TEAMS_READY) It is called by the referee when he wants to start the trial

      • informReferee

        public void informReferee()
        Operation Inform the referee. Transition to watch trial in the life cycle of the Coach. (ASSEMBLE_TEAM -> WATCH_TRIAL) It is called by the coach when he wants to inform the referee the team chosen.

      • reviewNotes

        public void reviewNotes()
        Operation Review Notes Transition to WAIT for the referee in the life cycle of the Coach. (WATCH_TRIAL -> WAIT_FOR_REFEREE_COMMAND) It is called by the coach when he wants review the notes after the triall .

      • getGameWinner

        public int getGameWinner​(int ropePosition)
        Operation Declare the winner of the game. * Transition to end of the game in the life cycle of the Referee. (WAIT_FOR_TRIAL_CONCLUSION -> END_OF_A_GAME)
        Parameters:
        ropePosition - the position of the rope at the end of the game
        Returns:
        the winning team (1 or 2) or 0 for a draw

      • getMatchWinner

        public void getMatchWinner​(int result)
        Declare the winner of the match. Transition to end of the game in the life cycle of the Referee. (END_OF_A_GAME -> END_OF_THE_MATCH)
        Parameters:
        result - the result of the match: negative for Team 1 win, positive for Team 2 win, zero for draw

      • waitNewGame

        public void waitNewGame()
        Operation Wait for a new game to be announced. Coach waits for the referee to announce a new Game (after reviweing notes)
